example.text: Ben equates this adrenaline rush to that brief moment of silence by the crowd when a baseball player delivers his pitch to the plate.

example.text: Permison made his biggest pitch of the game and struck out Prokopowicz.
example.note: Coreference takes care of "his" in this case -- no need to annotate.

example.text: ...So far Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan hasn't made a pitch for the job.
example.note: I think there's an unrealized arg 1 here: which is Greenspan and his agency itself (pitching himself for the job).
